crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Pastebin-style Service (textbin .net in TLS SNI)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Pastebin-style Service (textbin .net in TLS SNI)"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"textbin.net"; bsize:11; fast_pattern; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2037786; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2022_07_19, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2022_07_19;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Pastebin-style Service Domain in DNS Lookup (textbin .net)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO Pastebin-style Service Domain in DNS Lookup (textbin .net)"; dns.query; dotprefix; content:".textbin.net"; nocase; endswith; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2051002; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2024_02_21, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_02_21, reviewed_at 2024_03_22;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Pastebin-like Service Domain in DNS Lookup (paste .ee)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO Pastebin-like Service Domain in DNS Lookup (paste .ee)"; dns.query; bsize:8; content:"paste.ee"; nocase; reference:url,github.com/lorien/awesome-pastebins; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2054041; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2024_06_26, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_06_26, reviewed_at 2024_10_04;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY Pastebin-style Service (paste .ee) in TLS SNI
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY Pastebin-style Service (paste .ee) in TLS SNI"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"paste.ee"; bsize:8; fast_pattern; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2034978; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2022_01_26, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2022_01_26;)

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Paste sharing url in reverse order
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Paste sharing url in reverse order

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potential PowerShell Obfuscation Via Reversed Commands
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the presence of reversed PowerShell commands in the CommandLine. This is often used as a method of obfuscation by attackers
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea), Vasiliy Burov (rule), oscd.community, Tim Shelton

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Windows Shell/Scripting Processes Spawning Suspicious Programs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious child processes of a Windows shell and scripting processes such as wscript, rundll32, powershell, mshta...etc.

match_context.values: @{Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\wscript.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\GLPd.vbs; EventID=11}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Script Interpreter Execution From Suspicious Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a suspicious script execution in temporary folders or folders accessible by environment variables
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Schedule Task Creation From Env Variable Or Potentially Suspicious Path Via Schtasks.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Schtask creations that point to a suspicious folder or an environment variable often used by malware

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Change PowerShell Policies to an Insecure Level
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects changing the PowerShell script execution policy to a potentially insecure level using the "-ExecutionPolicy" flag.
